org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.snapshot

Class DirectorySnapshottableFeature

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.snapshot.DirectoryWithSnapshotFeature
      • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.snapshot.DirectorySnapshottableFeature
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    INode.Feature

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class DirectorySnapshottableFeature
extends DirectoryWithSnapshotFeature
    A directory with this feature is a snapshottable directory, where snapshots can be taken. This feature extends DirectoryWithSnapshotFeature, and maintains extra information about all the snapshots taken on this directory.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.snapshot.DirectoryWithSnapshotFeature

    • Field Detail

      • SNAPSHOT_LIMIT

        static final int SNAPSHOT_LIMIT
        Limit the number of snapshot per snapshottable directory.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • snapshotsByNames

        private final List<Snapshot> snapshotsByNames
        Snapshots of this directory in ascending order of snapshot names. Note that snapshots in ascending order of snapshot id are stored in DirectoryWithSnapshotFeature.diffs (a private field).

      • snapshotQuota

        private int snapshotQuota
        Number of snapshots allowed.

      • renameSnapshot

        public void renameSnapshot(String path,
                  String oldName,
                  String newName)
                    throws SnapshotException
        Rename a snapshot
        Parameters:
        path - The directory path where the snapshot was taken. Used for generating exception message.
        oldName - Old name of the snapshot
        newName - New name the snapshot will be renamed to
        Throws:
        SnapshotException - Throw SnapshotException when either the snapshot with the old name does not exist or a snapshot with the new name already exists

        public int getSnapshotQuota()

      • addSnapshot

        void addSnapshot(Snapshot snapshot)
        Simply add a snapshot into the snapshotsByNames. Used when loading fsimage.

                     throws SnapshotException,
                            QuotaExceededException
        Add a snapshot.
        Throws:

      • removeSnapshot

        public Snapshot removeSnapshot(BlockStoragePolicySuite bsps,
                      INodeDirectory snapshotRoot,
                      String snapshotName,
                      INode.BlocksMapUpdateInfo collectedBlocks,
                      List<INode> removedINodes)
                        throws SnapshotException
        Remove the snapshot with the given name from snapshotsByNames, and delete all the corresponding DirectoryDiff.
        Parameters:
        snapshotRoot - The directory where we take snapshots
        snapshotName - The name of the snapshot to be removed
        collectedBlocks - Used to collect information to update blocksMap
        Returns:
        The removed snapshot. Null if no snapshot with the given name exists.
        Throws:
        SnapshotException

      • computeContentSummary

        public ContentSummaryComputationContext computeContentSummary(BlockStoragePolicySuite bsps,
                                                     INodeDirectory snapshotRoot,
                                                     ContentSummaryComputationContext summary)

      • computeDiff

        SnapshotDiffInfo computeDiff(INodeDirectory snapshotRoot,
                           String from,
                           String to)
                       throws SnapshotException
        Compute the difference between two snapshots (or a snapshot and the current directory) of the directory.
        Parameters:
        from - The name of the start point of the comparison. Null indicating the current tree.
        to - The name of the end point. Null indicating the current tree.
        Returns:
        The difference between the start/end points.
        Throws:
        SnapshotException - If there is no snapshot matching the starting point, or if endSnapshotName is not null but cannot be identified as a previous snapshot.

      • getSnapshotByName

        private Snapshot getSnapshotByName(INodeDirectory snapshotRoot,
                         String snapshotName)
                            throws SnapshotException
        Find the snapshot matching the given name.
        Parameters:
        snapshotRoot - The directory where snapshots were taken.
        snapshotName - The name of the snapshot.
        Returns:
        The corresponding snapshot. Null if snapshotName is null or empty.
        Throws:
        SnapshotException - If snapshotName is not null or empty, but there is no snapshot matching the name.

      • computeDiffRecursively

        private void computeDiffRecursively(INodeDirectory snapshotRoot,
                          INode node,
                          List<byte[]> parentPath,
                          SnapshotDiffInfo diffReport)
        Recursively compute the difference between snapshots under a given directory/file.
        Parameters:
        snapshotRoot - The directory where snapshots were taken.
        node - The directory/file under which the diff is computed.
        parentPath - Relative path (corresponding to the snapshot root) of the node's parent.
        diffReport - data structure used to store the diff.

      • findRenameTargetPath

        private byte[][] findRenameTargetPath(INodeDirectory snapshotRoot,
                            INodeReference.WithName wn,
                            int snapshotId)
        We just found a deleted WithName node as the source of a rename operation. However, we should include it in our snapshot diff report as rename only if the rename target is also under the same snapshottable directory.
